verses.roman:
kata-kṣaṇe dui jane sthira yabe hailā
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅre kahite lāgilā

synonyms: kata-kṣaṇe—after some time; dui jane—both persons; sthira—patient; yabe—when; hailā—became; tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; kahite—to speak; lāgilā—began.
translation: After they had regained their patience, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began to speak.
